name: Erie Firefighters Local No. 293, Appellant, v. Gardner

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on opinion of Judge Daub, 26 Pa. D. & O. 2d 327.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Erie Firefighters Local No. 293, Appellant, v. Gardner.
Argued October 2, 1961.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and Alpern, JJ.

Gerald J. Weber, City Solicitor, with him Thomas 8. MszanowsM, Assistant City Solicitor, for City of Erie, appellee.

March 13, 1962:
